scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run install-all && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-admin && npm run copy-assets
scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm ci --no-audit && cd ../IPT-TAILWIND && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../admin && npm ci --no-audit
scripts.build-frontend: cd IPT-TAILWIND && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build
scripts.build-admin: cd admin && npx tailwindcss -i ./style/tailwind.css -o ./style/output.css --minify && mkdir -p dist && cp -r assets dist/ && cp -r style dist/ && cp *.html dist/
